original_title: When You Wish Upon a Pickle: A Sesame Street Special
overview: In When You Wish Upon a Pickle, a mysterious wish machine appears on Sesame Street and the magical pickle inside starts granting wishes. Before long, the gang learns they need to be careful what they wish for – especially when they find out he’ll only grant one wish per customer!
title: When You Wish Upon a Pickle: A Sesame Street Special
